document_data.caption: A map showing the Yak's Horn in the southwestern region of the Land of the Yak-Men.
document_data.name: Yak's Horn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Yak's Horn''' was a southwestern province of the [[Yikarian Empire]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Geography: This province was split into equal parts of rocky terrain from the [[World Pillar Mountains]] on the northeastern side, and a portion of the desert wasteland known as the [[Haunted Lands]] in the southwest. The Yak's Horn was easily the driest province of the Yikarian Empire.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Mother Millstone]] served as governor of the Yak's Horn.
